headline: Walmart CEO teases the future of retail
summary: Walmart (WMT) CEO Doug McMillon didn’t sound like he was lecturing us on retail. In fact, he sounded more like a guy who feels the future is already in motion. Buried beneath his comments over swifter deliveries and store-fulfilled orders, Walmart’s CEO pointed to a major shift into AI-powered ...

headline: Six-figure earners are ‘living the illusion of affluence’ while working side hustles, skipping meals and pretending Venmo’s not working
summary: "Many top earners say people assume they can afford it all, yet behind the image of success are quiet sacrifices: skipped purchases, delayed plans, and a fragile sense of security."

headline: Americans Are on a Year-End Shopping Spree
summary: America’s biggest retailers have discovered that the consumer is far from dead.  For all the hand-wringing over tariffs and a wobbling economy, shoppers are spending where they perceive value as evidenced by strong recent financial results from  Walmart Gap T.J. Maxx  parent  TJX  and other chains.  “As we look at our customers and members here in the U.S., they’re still spending,” said  John Furner,  the incoming chief executive of  Walmart  who currently runs the retailer’s U.S. business.
